DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Evaluate body mass index ( BMI ) , leptin , Leptin/adiponectin ( L/A ) ratio cancer antigen ( CA ) 15-3 together reliable biomarkers breast cancer . Patients : Consecutive patient age 40 - 60 year , breast disease inform consent . Interventions : Patients ' Anthropometric laboratorial characteristic classify BMI group cancer patient benign breast disease well biochemical test leptin , adiponectin , CA 15-3 , hemoglobin , glucose low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDLC ) , high-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( HDLC ) level obtain well blood sample analyze CA 15-3 level electrochemiluminescence immunoassay . Hypothesis : Using together leptin , L/A ratio , CA 15-3 BMI could offer reliable approach detect high risk woman develop breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: The Tetrad BMI , Leptin , Leptin/Adiponectin ( L/A ) Ratio CA-15-3 Reliable Biomarker Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Serum level leptin , adiponectin CA 15-3 , well anthropometric biochemical parameter analyze 88 female patient attend mammography study . Predictive value BMI , leptin , L/A ratio CA 15-3 determine 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) .
DOC.criteria: Female patient attend mammography , average age fourth fifth decade . Patients hormonal therapy .
